org.jetel.exception

Class TempFileCreationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.jetel.exception.TempFileCreationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TempFileCreationException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Custom exception for problems occurring when temp. file is being created.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TempFileCreationException.Reason
      Reason for the exception: NO_SPACE_AVAILABLE – temp file can not be created because there is no space on any of devices; not recognized in standalone engine IO_EXCEPTION – generic I/O exception without further detail

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TempFileCreationException(java.lang.String message, TempFileCreationException.Reason reason, java.lang.String label, int allocationHint, java.lang.Long runId)
      Creates new TempFileCreationException.
      TempFileCreationException(java.lang.Throwable cause, java.lang.String label, int allocationHint, java.lang.Long runId, TempSpace tempSpace)
      Creates new TempFileCreationException.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCause(java.lang.Throwable t, TempSpace tempSpace)
      Add next cause to the exception (this kind of exceptions can have multiple causes that are necessary but not sufficient conditions of the failure – only the combination is sufficient condition).
      TempFileCreationException.Reason getReason() 
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • TempFileCreationException

        public TempFileCreationException(java.lang.String message,
                         TempFileCreationException.Reason reason,
                         java.lang.String label,
                         int allocationHint,
                         java.lang.Long runId)
        Creates new TempFileCreationException. Intended for cases when there is only one cause and it is not and Throwable.
        Parameters:
        message - message detailing failure cause
        reason - reason for the failure
        label - label from temp file creation request
        allocationHint - allocation hint from temp file creation request
        runId - run id of the graph; may be null if not available

      • TempFileCreationException

        public TempFileCreationException(java.lang.Throwable cause,
                         java.lang.String label,
                         int allocationHint,
                         java.lang.Long runId,
                         TempSpace tempSpace)
        Creates new TempFileCreationException. Next causes can be added later by addCause(Throwable, TempSpace) method calls
        Parameters:
        cause - lower-level-of-abstraction Throwable that caused this exception
        label - label from temp file creation request
        allocationHint - allocation hint from temp file creation request
        runId - run id of the graph; may be null if not available
        tempSpace - temp space where temp file creation attempt has been performed

    • Method Detail

      • addCause

        public void addCause(java.lang.Throwable t,
            TempSpace tempSpace)

        Add next cause to the exception (this kind of exceptions can have multiple causes that are necessary but not sufficient conditions of the failure – only the combination is sufficient condition).

        This method is not valid if reason is already set (by TempFileCreationException(String, Reason, String, int, Long) constructor)

        Parameters:
        t - throwable that co-caused the exception
        tempSpace - temp space where temp file creation attempt leading to t has been performed

      • getReason

        public TempFileCreationException.Reason getReason()
        Returns:
        the reason

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Throwable
